description:
Is it even possible to get the warmth you need without the bulkiness that insulated styles often have? It sure is—if you have their men's Tri Thermal Threads Henley—and they'll tell you why.

The densely knitted fabric on the outer shell is an advanced fleece technology that delivers a hefty dose of warmth, without the weight. While inside, soft lining adds an extra layer of coziness.

This Henley silhouette is also amazingly versatile. Strong enough for hiking but still stylish enough to wear to holiday celebrations thanks to the details around the neckline. And they are big fans of a style that can pull double duty.
name: Prana Tri Thermal Threads Henley - Mens
